page.title: 08RELIGION
page.content: {Management:}Scottish Presbyterian Churches in Eckford and Crailing. They are linked with Oxnam and Roxburgh and served by one minister. In each parish church affairs are managed by a congregational board made up of minister, 5 elders and four members of congregation. Eckford Roll 98 Crailing Roll 57. Womans Guild meets in both parishes. {Services:}Minister preaches in Oxnam and Eckfoed 1st and 3rd Sunday in the month and Crailing and Roxburgh on 2nd and 4th. On 5th Sunday, Easter and Christmas combined services are held. Communion held twice a year. Christmas Eve(Watchnight) held in Eckford and Crailing alternately. Sunday School for 3-12year olds from Sept.to Easter. Run by volunteers. Nativity Play performend at Christmas. Roll 20.
